committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the 7 calendar days beginning September 26, 1976 as "National Port Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate the seven-day period beginning September 26, 1976, as "National Port Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the 7 calendar days beginning September 26, 1976 as "National Port Week".
